Package managers

Class WindowManager

java.lang.Object
managers.WindowManager
public class WindowManager extends Object
The WindowManager class manages the stages, scenes, and controllers of a JavaFX application.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addScene(String name, String fxmlFile, SessionManager sessionManager)
    Adds a Scene to the scenes map with the given name by loading it from an FXML file and setting its controller's windowManager and sessionManager properties.
    void
    addStage(String name, javafx.stage.Stage stage)
    Adds a Stage to the stages map with the given name.
    <T extends BasicController>
    T
    getController(String name)
    Returns a BasicController from the controllers map with the given name.
    static WindowManager
    getInstance()
    Returns the singleton instance of the WindowManager class.
    <T extends javafx.scene.Scene>
    T
    getScene(String name)
    Returns a Scene from the scenes map with the given name.
    javafx.stage.Stage
    getStage(String name)
    Returns a Stage from the stages map with the given name.
    void
    removeStage(String name)
    Removes a Stage from the stages map with the given name and closes it if it exists.
    void
    switchToScene(String stageName, String sceneName)
    Switches to a new Scene on a given Stage with a fade out and fade in transition.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static WindowManager getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the WindowManager class.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of the WindowManager class.

    • addStage

      public void addStage(String name, javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Adds a Stage to the stages map with the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Stage to add.
      stage - The Stage to add.

    • addScene

      public void addScene(String name, String fxmlFile, SessionManager sessionManager)
      Adds a Scene to the scenes map with the given name by loading it from an FXML file and setting its controller's windowManager and sessionManager properties.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Scene to add.
      fxmlFile - The FXML file to load the Scene from.
      sessionManager - The SessionManager to set on the Scene's controller.

    • switchToScene

      public void switchToScene(String stageName, String sceneName)
      Switches to a new Scene on a given Stage with a fade out and fade in transition.
      Parameters:
      stageName - The name of the Stage to switch Scenes on.
      sceneName - The name of the Scene to switch to.

    • getStage

      public javafx.stage.Stage getStage(String name)
      Returns a Stage from the stages map with the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Stage to return.
      Returns:
      The Stage with the given name or null if it does not exist in the stages map.

    • removeStage

      public void removeStage(String name)
      Removes a Stage from the stages map with the given name and closes it if it exists.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Stage to remove and close.

    • getScene

      public <T extends javafx.scene.Scene> T getScene(String name)
      Returns a Scene from the scenes map with the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Scene to return.
      Returns:
      The Scene with the given name or null if it does not exist in the scenes map.

    • getController

      public <T extends BasicController> T getController(String name)
      Returns a BasicController from the controllers map with the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the BasicController to return.
      Returns:
      The BasicController with the given name or null if it does not exist in the controllers map.
